resources.string: Arcagon is a casual/arcade type of game. It\'s real easy to learn, but hard to master. It has colorful graphics, great music and addictive gameplay!
Simply Sudoku is a game about solving sudoku puzzles that you know and love. It features clean sleek design, plenty of puzzles and lots of customization options.

Tangled is a game designed for fans of Entanglement on the PC platform. It features clean design, lots of level grids and has tons of customizations. 

Why not have a look!.
Price: FREE
Wormsy is a puzzle game where you need to help a worm escape from its maze. Find the shortest way out by pushing other worms and activating gates and other items!
